name: pokeblox
description: ## Background and Overview Tetris is a classic game with many fans around the world. It is played both casually and competitively by people of all ages. Pokémon is also a game with many fans around the world, and it, too, is played both casually and competitively. PokéBlox is a game that has all the functionality built into the Tetris that we all know and love with a little graphical and musical twist inspired by Pokémon.
